name: Hakuoki: Edo Blossoms - DLC Bundle
description:
Get the game + Edo Treasure Box DLC with this DLC Bundle!

Includes the following items:
  • Hakuoki: Edo Blossoms
  • Edo Treasure Box DLC

Delve deeper into the fascinating lore of Hakuoki with this collection of six previously-untold stories. The Edo Treasure Box DLC includes routes with:
  • Toshizo Hijikata
  • Souji Okita
  • Keisuke Sanan
  • Kazue Souma
  • Ryouma Sakamoto
  • Chikage Kazama
